original_text: The slave drivers kept pressing them, saying, “Complete the work required of you for each day, just as when you had straw.”
korean_text: 감독들이 그들을 독촉하여 이르되 너희는 짚이 있을 때와 같이 그 날의 일을 그 날에 마치라 하며

sentences.original_text: The slave drivers kept pressing them,
Complete the work required of you for each day,
just as when you had straw.
